name: HeadlineHub
description: This news app provides users with a comprehensive overview of the day’s headlines across various sections.

name: Image’s Text Extracter
description: This project was developed for Lava Company is centered around converting image’s text into text. This project is a simple image-to-text converter implemented in Python.

name: Blog App
description: This project is about a blog application in which a person can create his account and write their blog in the application.
